definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Textured yarn nes, of artificial filaments, not put up for retail sale.
sentences.chinese: 其他变形纱线，人造纤维长丝纺制，非供零售用。

sentences.english: Yarn of artificial filaments, single, nes, not put up.
sentences.chinese: 其他单纱，其他人造纤维长丝纺制，非供零售用。

sentences.english: Man-made fibre is natural fibrous rebuilds to be handled with chemistry, be like nylon.
sentences.chinese: 人造纤维是自然纤维的重建与化学处理，如尼龙。

sentences.english: Water- soluble sizes are generally used on man- made fibers.
sentences.chinese: 水溶性浆料一般用于人造纤维。

sentences.english: Synthetic fabrics usually don’t wrinkle as easily as cotton.
sentences.chinese: 人造纤维织物一般没有棉织物那么容易起皱。

sentences.english: The rayon and rubber V-belt are widely used for power transmission.
sentences.chinese: 人造纤维和橡胶V形带广泛应用于动力传送。

sentences.english: Rayon is not easy to get crinkle than cotton fabric.
sentences.chinese: 人造纤维织物一般没有棉织物那么容易起皱。

sentences.english: I don't like wearing clothes made of artificial fibres.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢穿人造纤维的衣服。

sentences.english: Manmade fibers such as polyester are a better choice。
sentences.chinese: 人造纤维，例如伸缩尼龙就是个更好的选择。

sentences.english: Even Aleck's man-made fiber coat caught fire.
sentences.chinese: 甚至亚力克的人造纤维外衣也着了火。

sentences.english: rayon is not so easy to crinkle as cotton fabric.
sentences.chinese: 人造纤维织物一般没有棉织物那么容易起皱。

sentences.english: Features a blend of natural bristles and synthetic fibres.
sentences.chinese: 刷毛由柔软的鹅毛与人造纤维混合制成。

definition: variant of 滌綸|涤纶[di2 lun2]
